SQL.LOAD: SELECT customer_id, entity_name, entity_id, direction, communication_channel, communication_format, cust_contact_id, communication_component, component_ref_id, communication_status, comm_response_id, comm_response_xml, is_retryable, retry_compo_reference, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, cust_communication_id FROM elita.elp_cust_communication WHERE cust_communication_id = :cust_communication_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elita.elp_cust_communication SET customer_id = :customer_id, entity_name = :entity_name, entity_id = :entity_id, direction = :direction, communication_channel = :communication_channel, communication_formart = :communication_format, cust_contact_id = :cust_contact_id, communication_component = :communication_component, component_ref_id = :component_ref_id, communication_status = :communication_status, comm_response_id = :comm_response_id, comm_response_xml = :comm_response_xml, is_retryable = :is_retryable, retry_compo_reference = :retry_compo_reference, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE cust_communication_id = :cust_communication_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elita.elp_cust_communication ( customer_id, entity_name, entity_id, direction, communication_channel, communication_format, cust_contact_id, communication_component, component_ref_id, communication_status, comm_response_id, comm_response_xml, is_retryable, retry_compo_reference, created_by, cust_communication_id ) VALUES ( :customer_id, :entity_name, :entity_id, :direction, :communication_channel, :communication_format, :cust_contact_id, :communication_component, :component_ref_id, :communication_status, :comm_response_id, :comm_response_xml, :is_retryable, :retry_compo_reference, :created_by, :cust_communication_id )
